name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Goku: Strength and Adventure in a Live Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleash the power of Goku with dynamic visuals and quick shortcuts in this action-packed theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embrace the power of Goku with this dynamic theme featuring sleek design and quick shortcuts.

Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Step into the Dragon Ball universe with vibrant visuals of Goku in his most iconic forms.
Minimalist Design: A clean and action-packed interface that captures the energy and spirit of Goku.
Clock and Date: Keep track of time and date at a glance while enjoying the epic visuals.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate instantly to your favorite websites with effortless speed.
Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with the engine selected by the user.
More Extension: Add features to enhance your browsing experience with Gokuâ€™s unstoppable determination.
